Git-Deps-Syncer Carbon example screens:

config locations:

sync-all prompt message:

https://carbon.now.sh/?bg=rgba%28255%2C255%2C255%2C1%29&t=material&wt=none&l=text&width=680&ds=false&dsyoff=20px&dsblur=68px&wc=true&wa=true&pv=56px&ph=56px&ln=false&fl=1&fm=Fira+Code&fs=14px&lh=152%25&si=false&es=2x&wm=false&code=%250A%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%2520%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%2520%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%2520%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%2520%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%250A%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2594%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2594%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%259D%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2594%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2594%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%259D%2520%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2594%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%259D%25E2%2595%259A%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%2520%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2594%25E2%2595%259D%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%2520%2520%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2591%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2594%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%259D%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2594%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%259D%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2594%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%250A%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2591%2520%2520%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2591%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%2520%2520%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2594%25E2%2595%259D%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%2520%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%2520%25E2%2595%259A%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2594%25E2%2595%259D%2520%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2594%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%2520%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2591%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2591%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2597%2520%2520%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2594%25E2%2595%259D%250A%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2591%2520%2520%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2591%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2595%2594%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%2590%25E2%2595%259D%2520%2520%25E2%2596%2588%25E2%2596%258 53D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%250A%2520%2520This%2520script%2520syncs%2520external%2520git%2520dependencies%2520for%2520the%2520repository%2520%27my-super-project%27.%250A%250A%2520%2520What%2520are%2520dependencies%253F%250A%2520%2520These%2520are%2520source%2520dependant%2520git%2520repositories%2520that%2520are%2520getting%2520cloned%2520locally%2520and%2520their%2520files%2520are%250A%2520%2520being%2520copied%2520directly%2520to%2520this%2520repository.%250A%250A%2520%2520Locations%253A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2580%25A2%2520Repositories%2520content%2520path%2520-%2520%253CREPO-ROOT%253E%252F.git-deps%252Fexternal%252F%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%25E2%2580%25A2%2520Repositories%2520symlink%2520path%2520-%2520%253CREPO-ROOT%253E%252Fexternal%252F%250A%250A%2520%2520How%2520to%2520declare%2520a%2520dependency%253F%250A%2520%2520To%2520add%252Fremove%2520an%2520external%2520git%2520dependency%252C%2520update%2520the%2520JSON%2520file%2520%253CROOT%253E%252F.git-deps%252Fconfig.json%250A%2520%2520%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%253D%250A%250A%2520%2520Sync%2520external%2520git%2520dependencies%2520%28enter%2520to%2520skip%29%253F%2520%28y%252Fn%29%253A%2520
